actions.Name: ACTION_T_NONE
actions.desc: Does nothing.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_TEXT
actions.desc: Displays the specified -TextId. When -TextId2 and -TextId3 are specified, the selection will be Randomized between 1,2 or 3. Text ID's are defined, along with other options for the text, in creature_ai_texts table. Below is detailed Text Information. All text ID values for EventAI MUST be negative.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_FACTION
actions.desc: Changes faction for a creature. When param1 is zero, creature will revert to it's default faction. Flags will determine when faction is restored to default (evade, respawn etc)

actions.Name: ACTION_T_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL
actions.desc: Sets either model from creature_template.entry (Param1) OR explicit modelId (Param2) for the NPC. If (Param1) AND (Param2) are both 0, NPC will demorph and revert to the default model (as specified in creature_template).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SOUND
actions.desc: NPC Plays a specified Sound ID.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_EMOTE
actions.desc: NPC Does a specified Emote ID.

actions.Name: UNUSED
actions.desc: UNUSED

actions.Name: UNUSED
actions.desc: UNUSED

actions.Name: UNUSED
actions.desc: UNUSED

actions.Name: ACTION_T_RANDOM_SOUND
actions.desc: NPC Plays a Random Sound ID (Random Selects Param1, Param2 or Param3) *

actions.Name: ACTION_T_RANDOM_EMOTE
actions.desc: NPC Emotes a Random Emote ID (Random Selects Param1, Param2 or Param3) *

actions.Name: ACTION_T_CAST
actions.desc: Casts spell (Param1) on a target (Param2) using cast flags (Param3) --> Specified Below

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SUMMON
actions.desc: Summons a Creature ID (Param1) for (Param3) duration after Evade (In MS) and orders it to attack (Param2) target (specified below). Spawns on top of NPC who summons it.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT
actions.desc: Modifies a threat by (Param1) percent on a target (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_THREAT_ALL_PCT
actions.desc: Modifies a threat by (Param1) on all targets in the threat list (using -100% here will result in full aggro dump).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_QUEST_EVENT
actions.desc: Calls AreaExploredOrEventHappens with (Param1) for a target in (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_QUEST_CASTCREATUREGO
actions.desc: Sends CastCreatureOrGo for a creature specified by CreatureId (Param1) with provided spell id (Param2) for a target in (Param3).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_UNIT_FIELD
actions.desc: Sets a unit field (Param1) to provided value (Param2) on a target in (Param3).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_UNIT_FLAG
actions.desc: Sets flag (flags can be used together to modify multiple flags at once) on a target (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG
actions.desc: Removes flag on a target (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_AUTO_ATTACK
actions.desc: Stop melee attack when (Param1) is zero, otherwise continue attacking / allow melee attack.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_COMBAT_MOVEMENT
actions.desc: Stop combat based movement when (Param1) is zero, otherwise continue/allow combat based movement (targeted movement generator).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_PHASE
actions.desc: Sets the current phase to (Param1).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_INC_PHASE
actions.desc: Increments the phase by (Param1). May be negative to decrement, but should not be zero.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_EVADE
actions.desc: Forces the creature to evade, wiping all threat and dropping combat.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST
actions.desc: Causes the creature to flee for assistence (often at low health).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_QUEST_EVENT_ALL
actions.desc: Calls GroupEventHappens with (Param1). Only used if it's _expected_ event should call quest completion for all players in a current party. Can be used for the creature's threat list, for complex scripted events.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_CASTCREATUREGO_ALL
actions.desc: Calls CastedCreatureOrGo for all players on the threat list with quest id specified in (Param1) and spell id in (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL
actions.desc: Removes all auras on a target (Param1) caused by a spell (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_RANGED_MOVEMENT
actions.desc: Changes the movement generator to a ranged type. (note: default melee type can still be set by using 0 as angle and 0 as distance).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_RANDOM_PHASE
actions.desc: Sets a phase to a specified id(s)*

actions.Name: ACTION_T_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE
actions.desc: Sets a phase to a random id (Phase = PhaseMin + rnd % PhaseMin-PhaseMax). PhaseMax must be greater than PhaseMin.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SUMMON
actions.desc: Summons a creature (Param1) to attack target (Param2) at location specified by EventAI_Summons (Param3).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_KILLED_MONSTER
actions.desc: Calls KilledMonster (Param1) for a target (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_INST_DATA
actions.desc: Calls ScriptedInstance::SetData with field (Param1) and data (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_INST_DATA64
actions.desc: Calls ScriptedInstance::SetData64 with field (Param1) and target's GUID (Param2).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_UPDATE_TEMPLATE
actions.desc: Changes a creature's template to (Param1) with team = Alliance or Horde when (Param2) is either false or true respectively.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_DIE
actions.desc: Kills the creature

actions.Name: ACTION_T_ZONE_COMBAT_PULSE
actions.desc: Puts all players within an instance into combat with the creature. Only works when a creature is already in combat. Doesn't work outside instances.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_CALL_FOR_HELP
actions.desc: Call any friendly out-of-combat creatures in a radius (Param1) to attack current creature's target.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_SHEATH
actions.desc: Sets sheath state for a creature (0 = no weapon, 1 = melee weapon, 2 = ranged weapon).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_FORCE_DESPAWN
actions.desc: Despawns the creature, if delay = 0 immediate otherwise will despawn after delay time set in Param1 (in ms).

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_INVINCIBILITY_HP_LEVEL
actions.desc: Set min. health level for creature that can be set at damage as flat value or percent from max health

actions.Name: ACTION_T_MOUNT_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL
actions.desc: Set mount model from creature_template.entry (Param1) OR explicit modelId (Param2). If (Param1) AND (Param2) are both 0, unmount.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_CHANCED_TEXT
actions.desc: Displays by Chance (1..100) the specified -TextId. When -TextId2 is specified, the selection will be randomized. Text types are defined, along with other options for the text, in a table below. Param2 and Param3 needs to be negative.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_THROW_AI_EVENT
actions.desc: Throws an AIEvent of type (Param1) to nearby friendly Npcs in range of (Param2)

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_THROW_MASK
actions.desc: Marks for which AIEvents the npc will throw AIEvents on its own.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_STAND_STATE
actions.desc: Set the unit stand state (Param1) of the current creature.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_CHANGE_MOVEMENT
actions.desc: Change the unit movement type (Param1). If the movement type is Random Movement (1), the WanderDistance (Param2) must be provided. If the movement type is Waypoint Movement (2), Param2 is PathId.

actions.Name: ACTION_T_DYNAMIC_MOVEMENT
actions.desc: Enable dynamic movement behavior (1 = on; 0 = off)

actions.Name: ACTION_T_SET_REACT_STATE
actions.desc: Change react state of the creature
